page.title: 08Manifest Theatre,Manningtree
page.content:
Manningtree is unusual because it has an amateur dramatic society which owns its own theatre. The building used to be a primary school owned by the Methodist Church and it is now called Wesley House. The Manifest Theatre Group puts on four plays a year and many members of Manningtree School take part. The producer and guiding spirit of the Manifest Theatre Group is the local police sergeant who lives in Mistley called Sergeant Murfitt. The plays are all sold out quickly even though they run for a week, the last play was called 'Chicago'.
By Mrs.A.Rogers, Teacher
